Articles.Content:
so my game crashes (or freeze for a really looong time) when I'm changing my soi from Rhode to Lua (I'm playing on beyond kerbin) I have a lot of mods installed and the reason of the crash seems to be that, but I'm not sure. it might just be a good old out of memory error. in case of the last one how can I make my ksp use less memory

Quote

Cannot find preset 'GPP_High' for pqs 'Lua'

logfile https://www.dropbox.com/s/ivr95f3cstfpnpi/KSP.log?dl=0

modlist https://imgur.com/a/zqMVNP5

 

Edit: 

confirmed it happens because out off memory error seems to be a memory leak no idea why it leaks tho

also, it doesn't crash rather freezes for an infinite amount of time. 

memory gets stuck at 10.5 GB of ram for a long time then starts going down slowly

if i left the game running for a long time it might un freeze

Edited March 17, 2019 by villsukka
confirmed the reason for crash
